## Frog Timeline

- First described (Baird 1854)
- Synopsis of Amphibia in CA (Storer 1925)
- Full species detailed (Zweifel 1955)
- Species of Special Concern (1994 Jennings and Hayes, CDFW)
- Petition for Listing (2013? USFWS/CBD)
- Status Review and Listing State ESA (2020)
- Federal listing? (USFWS 2023)
